attributes.action: Impose an earliest time (9:00)  that schools can open to students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a proven fact that sleep is good for the brain, and schools are designed to help students perform to their best. This is why it is possibly a logical error to make students get up very early to get to school on time, as well as parents. Also, how can students get to sleep ealy with the homework mounting up as it does in most secondary schoool.
